info.name: Simple Munching Squares
info.description:
Super short implementation of Munching Squares: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Munching_square, probably one of (if not the) earliest demo effect, created on a PDP-1.

A super cool recording of Munching Squares: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V4oRHv-Svwc

renderpass.name: Image
